mapper.select: SELECT w.id id, w.user_id userID, w.pjm_id pjmID, w.finnish_condition pjmCondition, DATE_FORMAT(w.write_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime FROM stu_dorm w WHERE w.user_id in (select id from sys_user where username=#{username}) ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT w.id id, w.user_id userID, w.absent_time absenceTime, w.message message FROM absent w WHERE w.user_id in (select id from sys_user where username=#{username}) ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
